page.title: 18LIFESTYLES_A WEEKEND
page.content: This is a weekend in summer for me. Iam ten years old.Sometimes I go swim- ing in the sea,especially when the weather is hot.The sea is quite cold, but once you get in it's not so bad! Sometimes I go out waist high,but I'm careful to stay in my depth,because of the waves.Ilike the waves that don't break best,so I can swim breaststroke and you bob up and down.There is a rock pool at Chapel Rock and in that pool is a lot of sea water.I don't like it much though,because it tends to have stones at the bottom. At the top of Chapel Rock is a flagpole.On it go the warning flags for all the bathers.They put up a red flag when the sea is too rough to swim in safely.I enjoy going on the beach, but not so much when it's crowded.
